scripts.build:cdn: packu minify -i twemojis -o packages/cdn && node src/builders/cdn.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:cdn && npm run build:scss && npm run build:sass && npm run build:react && npm run build:js
scripts.publish:css: npm run build:css && cd packages/css && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:cdn: npm run build:cdn && cd packages/cdn && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:scss: npm run build:scss && cd packages/scss && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sass: npm run build:sass && cd packages/sass && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:react: npm run build:react && cd packages/react && npm publish
scripts.publish:js: npm run build:js && cd packages/js && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:css && npm run publish:cdn && npm run publish:scss && npm run publish:sass && npm run publish:react && npm run publish:js
